attributes.action: Renew Playground Equipment at a Park in Whitchurch, Bristol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see play equipment for children in a local park get renewed.
I live in Whitchrch and the park is off of Whitchurch lane, it gets used by small children both on their way to and from school and with the right kind of protection from dogs etc would provide the badly needed facilities this forgotten area is crying out for.
